title: my new 4a is too small for my old sim card..the t-mobile asst. said to cut..what to do
content: I have called my mobile company and no one really new anything.. On the instructions                    it said I could get a QR code but they had no idea.  also couldn't transfer data from my phone. it said not the right cord but i have one that is connected to the plug, its like almost 10 yrs, old.  works still but its windows. I just tried to cut it but its still too long and I would have to cut the gold part off.
